title: Adservice Dashboard
description: Designed interfaces for affiliate advertisers, publishers and staff at the Affiliate Network Adservice
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. I was assigned the responsibility of redesigning the current 3 interfaces to match 1 single design system instead of 3 different. Further more new features and subpages were added.
solution: Several new features were added to through my time at Adservice as well as an new and cohesive design system that connected all interfaces together. Several user frictions were fixed through user feedback resulting in increased revenue and user retention.
